name: Ponged Pummel
description:
The World of Smash Bros is now... PONGED...

Beautifully designed Stages, Smooth Pixel animated Characters, Rich retro Music, and polished mechanics..... ALL IN A SINGLE GAME!

Experience Pong... with a distinct twist!

This is a Demo of PONGED Pummel that is currently under development by Rising Retro and RetroRobo!

Controls

  • Move Player 1: W and S keys
  • Move Player 2: I and K keys
  • Player 1 Use Power: X key
  • Player 2 Use Power M key

Made with Godot Game Engine.
